thread.title: Boris Johnson told off for sexist comments in UK parliament

title: Boris Johnson told off for sexist comments in UK parliament
text:
Boris Johnson told off for sexist comments in UK parliament 1:10pm BST - 00:55 
UK Foreign Secretary Boris Johnson was told off by the house speaker for his comments regarding Labour MP Emily Thornberry in parliament in London. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
UK Foreign Secretary Boris Johnson was told off by the house speaker for his comments regarding Labour MP Emily Thornberry in parliament in London. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
